title: Military Leaders Shouldn't Be Forced to Play Politics
description: The top ranks of the US military are witnessing unprecedented turnover. One recent departure may be the most worrying: Admiral Alvin Holsey, head of Southern Command, is retiring only a year into his tenure, reportedly after clashing with the administration over strikes on alleged drug smugglers in the Caribbean. With US forces possibly gearing up to attack military targets in Venezuela, the churn should be ringing alarms in Congress.
content: The top ranks of the US military are witnessing unprecedented turnover. One recent departure may be the most worrying: Admiral Alvin Holsey, head of Southern Command, is retiring only a year into his tenure, reportedly after clashing with the adminis... [862 chars]

title: China Opposes Trump's Military Threat Against Nigeria, Stands by Venezuela
description: China firmly opposes US President Trump's military threats against Nigeria amidst claims of Christian persecution. It supports Nigeria's efforts in combating terrorism and fostering interfaith harmony. Additionally, China criticizes US strikes in Venezuela and stresses the importance of international cooperation while opposing unilateral actions.
content: China has voiced strong opposition to US President Donald Trump's threats of military action against Nigeria in response to alleged Christian persecution. The Chinese Foreign Ministry reiterated its support for Nigeria in pursuing a development path ... [661 chars]

title: Is Trump Launching A New War? The US Military Build-Up In The Caribbean Explained
description: Trump intensifies US military actions near Venezuela, raising conflict fears as the Caribbean sees increased anti-narcotics operations.

title: ¿Depende Trinidad y Tobago del gas venezolano?

title: Latinoamérica y la diáspora venezolana están a favor de una intervención militar de Estados Unidos en Venezuela, revela encuesta
description: Una reciente encuesta Latam-Wide de Atlas Intel revela la perspectiva en la región. También cuestiona el papel de presidentes como Petro.
